message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you 400000, but I think I deserve more since I'm the one making the offer this time.
I'll give you a bit more, but I think I deserve a better deal after your last offer
I'll give you a small share, but I think I'm getting closer to a fair deal. You should consider this one.
I'm willing to give you more, but I still think I deserve a better deal
I'm getting closer to my target, but I'm still not satisfied. You're not giving me enough.

I'm getting desperate, but I still think I deserve more. This is my last chance to make a good deal.
I'm not going to give you all the value, let's meet in the middle
